definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 这张大床是为篮坛巨人姚明特制的。

sentences.english: Valentine's Day gifts available for sale at Praline.
sentences.chinese: 特制情人节精美礼物，精点坊有售。

sentences.english: This special blade on his knife is for picking stones out of horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 他刀上有一特制刀刃，是用来剔去马蹄上的石头的。

sentences.english: Tailor-made dynamic contact resistance of gold hit the brake trigger switch, a permanent warranty.
sentences.chinese: 黄金接点特制耐动击刹车触发开关，永久保用。

sentences.english: The southpaw needed a special glove.
sentences.chinese: 这个左撇子需要特制的手套。

sentences.english: Funds can buy micro-nutrients customized to locations.
sentences.chinese: 基金可以购买根据当地情况特制的微营养素。

sentences.english: He also gargles with a special medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他总是用一种特制的药漱口。

sentences.english: The bigger ones get hooked with a special gaff.
sentences.chinese: 大鱼就用特制的鱼钩钩住。

sentences.english: Classic cabinet design, special net enclosures, rich.
sentences.chinese: 经典箱体设计，特制网罩。

sentences.english: Specially-made thick broad-bean sauce is a core product of this food company.
sentences.chinese: 特制豆酱是这个食品公司的主要产品。

sentences.english: It's steamed and served with our special sauce.
sentences.chinese: 蒸过后加上本店特制的调味料。

sentences.english: Both were then packaged into a specially designed two-sided container.
sentences.chinese: 然后将它们都打包进一个特制的双面容器内。

sentences.english: It’s another purpose built track with some interesting features.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个特制的赛道，有一些有趣的特色。

sentences.english: The deposit on the heating surface of LTE can be cleaned away by a special mechanical ash-remover at any time.
sentences.chinese: 特制的机械清灰装置可随时除去受热面的积灰。

sentences.english: Clay becomes very hard when it is put in a fire or a special oven called akiln.
sentences.chinese: 粘土放在土里或者特制的叫窑的炉里会变得相当坚硬。

sentences.english: Grilled chicken with special mushroom sauce, served with butter rice and fresh garden salad.
sentences.chinese: 香烤鸡块伴特制蘑菇酱，配有油饭和新鲜田园沙拉。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
to prepare (food etc) using a secret recipe
